Html: the release notes say that 3.4 supports side-by-side stereoscopic graphics. By default, StereoCamera displays frame sequential stereo. How do I change to side by side?

Yes, it renders frame sequential stereo, but you can see how I make it side-by-side in Tutorial 13 by rendering the frames into two textures.

thanks, i see. how do I change the screen resolution/windowsize of goblinxna? i really want a  1600x600

In your main Game class's constructor, do

graphics = new GraphicsDeviceManager(this);
graphics.PreferredBackBufferWidth = 1600;
graphics.PreferredBackBufferHeight = 600;

If you do it outside of your constructor, then you also need to call

graphics.ApplyChanges();
